sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Democritus, or Doctor Merry-man his medicines, against melancholy humors. Written by S.R. Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
[46] p.
Printed [by William Jaggard] for Iohn Deane, and are to be sold at his shop at Temple-barre, vnder the gate, [London] : [1607]
S.R. = Samuel Rowlands. In verse. Imprint date (cropped in both copies known) and printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-F⁴ (-A1). Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

S.R. = Samuel Rowlands. In verse. Imprint date (cropped in both copies known) and printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-F⁴ (-A1). Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
